name: Motoz
tecnology: React , React Router , Node.js, Firebase, Express.js, Mongodb, Metarial-Ui, React Hook Form
about: Motoz is an online bike shop.
about2: ●  Motoz is an online bike shop.
about3: ●  Navigation, service, banner, footer, contact have been used on the home page of the website..
about4: ●  if the admin logs in, he will see the Manage All Order page, Manage Product page , make admin, cancle order.
about5: ●  The user must be logged in to order the product.
about6: ●  He will be able to review by going to add review.
about7: ●  User see all his orders on my order page.

name: Tourism Lover
tecnology: React , React Router , Node.js, Firebase, Express.js, Mongodb, React Bootstrap, React Hook Form
about: Tourism lover is a tourist booking website.
about2: ●  Tourism lover is a tourist booking website.
about3: ●  Tourism lover is a government approved private company that is working to help people who come on tour.
about4: ●  Pictures and names of several places of interest can be seen in the Gallery component and our team members are given pictures and surnames.
about5: ●  Service is provided in the service component. And clicking on the book now button will show the details of the service.
about6: ●  The service can be added through the add service page.

name: Medical Care
tecnology: React , React Router , Firebase, React Bootstrap, React Hook Form
about: This website is made for a medical clinic.
about2: ●  This website is made for a medical clinic.
about3: ●  The services can be found on our service page.
about4: ●  Clicking the call us button on the service page will show detailed information on the new route according to that ID
about5: ●  We have detailed information in the About section.
about6: ●  In Blog component , there describe about covid 19.
about7: ●  Customers will be able to take all our benefits through the service page.

name: Code Knowledge
tecnology: React , React Router , React Bootstrap , Css
about3: ● The project is create to develop a little online medium for teaching nationwide programming under the supervision of Code Knowledge.
about4: ● Fees and teachers are different for each course. Each course must be purchased.
about5: ●  With the help of header session you can go to any route.
about6: ●  The question and answer part , we describe about some basic programming language.
about7: ●  Code Knowledge is a nationwide online platform for learning programming. We believe that programming will bring a new look to the world. This online education system has been introduced so that we do not fall behind in programming.

name: Roktokonika Volunteer
about: The project is create to find volunteers for good social work.
about2: ●  The project is create to find volunteers for good social work.
about3: ●  Our budget for social development is $100,000.
about4: ●  Those who will volunteer will have to give their name, surname, address, age, email and donation. There will be a button below the details of each volunteer. Button event handler is used.
about5: ●  Clicking on the button will add his donation to the cart on the right and the number of times he clicks on the button will be the same amount of donation. How many people have donated will also be written. And all donations will be total. And the names of those who have donated will remain.
